live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
42836.summary: Customers in the South Pandosy - KLO area of Kelowna are experiencing an interruption to their  Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
42836.title: Oct 10 – Kelowna (South Pandosy - KLO) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
